reg_info.act_under: Emergency Management and Civil Protection Act

content.content: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The terms of this Order are set out in Schedule 1.

content.content: 2. (1) This Order applies as of 12:01 a.m. on January 14, 2021. O. Reg. 11/21, s. 2. (2) Beginning on February 10, 2021, this Order applies to every individual residing in a particular health unit if another Order made under the Act specifies that this Order applies to that health unit. O. Reg. 94/21, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
2. (1) This Order applies as of 12:01 a.m. on January 14, 2021. O. Reg. 11/21, s. 2.

(2) Beginning on February 10, 2021, this Order applies to every individual residing in a particular health unit if another Order made under the Act specifies that this Order applies to that health unit. O. Reg. 94/21, s. 1.

content.content: 3. In this Order, “health unit” means a health unit as defined in the Health Protection and Promotion Act. O. Reg. 94/21, s. 2. Schedule 1
content.raw_html:
3. In this Order,

“health unit” means a health unit as defined in the Health Protection and Promotion Act. O. Reg. 94/21, s. 2.

Schedule 1

content.content: 1. (1) Every individual shall remain at the residence at which they are currently residing at all times unless leaving their residence is necessary for one or more of the following purposes:
